Title: My Dinner in Hell
Plot: After watching an embarrassing program on TV with Susan, Steve bumps into his dream celebrity, Mariella Frostrup, in the bar, but it is not the dream encounter he might like, as she pours her drink down his trousers. Jane and Sally's attempt to make friends with her get him into more trouble as he then has to have dinner with Susan's liberal-minded parents, which turns into a nightmare as misunderstandings multiply.
GuestStars: Mariella Frostrup, Wanda Ventham, James Woolley, Nick Moorcroft, Wendy Wason, Samuel Barnett
